turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Palermo Air Force Station.
turn.1: What was the mission of Palermo Air Force Station?
turn.2: Palermo's GATR (Ground Air Transmitter Receiver) site (R-28) remained active until 1975, becoming a detachment of the 770th Radar Squadron at Fort Meade, Maryland.
turn.4: The housing reportedly was transferred to the U.S.
turn.5: What did the US do with it?
turn.8: For many years, the site was abandoned and overgrown, with deteriorating buildings and former radar towers dominating the site.
turn.10: Palermo AFS was demolished in 2003 and was redeveloped into the "Osprey Point" single-family housing development, with no evidence of the former military radar station.
